      • validateOrder

        private boolean validateOrder​(Order clientOrder)
        This method validateOrder checks so the order is not out of bounds and its within limits such as minimum amount, and that currency is supported, and that there is enough in cashBox for transaction to be made. Amount should also be a even value for to be valid.
        Parameters:
        clientOrder - (Order) holding all the necessary details for further processing
        Returns:
        boolean holding the outcome of the operation

      • checkDouble

        private static java.lang.Boolean checkDouble​(java.lang.String input)
        This method is a helper that parse the amount into a Double format
        Parameters:
        input - a String holding the requested Amount
        Returns:
        boolean holding the outcome of the operation

      • exchangeProcess

        private static java.lang.Boolean exchangeProcess​(Site that,
                                                 Order orderData,
                                                 java.lang.Double comission)
        This method exchangeProcess process the validated order and calculate the exchange rate but also local commission for business Notification by print out to the Client, and a transaction will be made.
        Parameters:
        that - Site corresponding the Site Choice
        orderData - (Order) holding all order data/information
        comission - (Double) holding the commission rate - to be calculated
        Returns:
        a boolean true or false for exchangeProcess completed
